2019-05-12

SF and Farallon Islands

May 10 - 12. Our first overnight trip together. Karaoke and roller skating in the funky Church of 8 Wheels in San Francisco.

We walked around Little Italy and walked into a restaurant during a quiet afternoon and asked for Zabaglione. The nice restaurant owner said itâ€™s not on the menu but said he will have the chef make it for us. It has become Our Dessert ever since.

You had a special surprise for me and told me to dress warm. It was for a boat trip to Farallon Islands. I remember seeing huge whales and lots of seals and birds, although to be honest, my memory is fuzzy as I was seasick most of the time. I will always pack Dramamine on all our future trips.

I have fond memories of eating that Zabaglione with you

Last picture I took before I got seasick, which is only 10 minutes into the boat ride
